english_example_sentence: Even in this difficult situation, you can hope for a good future.
russian_example_sentence: Даже в этой сложной ситуации вы можете надеяться на хорошее будущее.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu zor durumda bile iyi bir gelecek umabilirsiniz.
